plot: Popular small town resident, seen as a pillar in the community was actually running one of the largest Ponzi Schemes in Oklahoma History.
title: Anatomy of a Fraud: The Rogue Broker
plot_es: Popular small town resident, seen as a pillar in the community was actually running one of the largest Ponzi Schemes in Oklahoma History.
original_name: Anatomy of a Fraud: The Rogue Broker
plot_en: Popular small town resident, seen as a pillar in the community was actually running one of the largest Ponzi Schemes in Oklahoma History.
